2D Texture Arrays

Creating a Filmstrip Illusion

Similar to our previous example, here we also use a texture3D TOP thatâ€™s set to pre-fill. Here our instances are arranged based on a vertical line. The border dressing done in textures creates the illusion of a film strip. Finally, we use a math CHOP to seamlessly snap our filmstrip back to the top at a regular interval.
